sources.title: Private Snafu: Fighting Tools (1943)
sources.description: In this installment, Private SNAFU learns the lessons of a weapons maintenance. Private SNAFU (Situation Normal All F*cked Up) was produced as a series of instructional cartoons by the US Army Signal Corps, and was originally created by Theodore Geisel (better known as Dr. Seuss) and Phil Eastman.Â
